attributes.action: UK to join the Schengen Area when leaving the EU
attributes.background: The Schengen Area has a population of over 400 million people and an area of 4,312,099 square kilometres (1,664,911 sq mi). The decrease in the cost of trade due to Schengen varies from 0.42% to 1.59% depending on geography, trade partners, and other factors.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament could not unilaterally decide to join the Schengen Area. 

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to begin negotiations to join the Schengen Area, if that's what you would like to happen.
